methods.description: Get all available markets.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: This is a ISO language string e.g. 'de' and is spoken in Austria 'AT', Germany 'DE' and Swiss 'CH'.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: This is a ISO country string e.g. Germany 'DE' or Swiss 'CH'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

methods.description: Get the market with the given marketId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: Represent a market (aka country) with a specific country and a language.

methods.description: Get all available bodies for the given marketId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: This is a class id e.g. '176' for 'A-Class' in Germany.

parameters.name: bodyId
parameters.description: This is a body id e.g. '1' for 'Limousine' in Germany.

parameters.name: productGroups
parameters.description:
Specifies to which product groups the vehicles belong which should be returned. The product groups are separated from each other by a comma and are case sensitive. Allowed values are:
  * PKW
  * VAN
  * SMART

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

methods.description: Get the body for the given marketId and bodyId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: bodyId
parameters.description: This is a body id e.g. '1' for 'Limousine' in Germany.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: The body of a Vehicle, e.g. 'Limousine'.

methods.description: Get all available classes for the given marketId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: This is a class id e.g. '176' for 'A-Class' in Germany.

parameters.name: bodyId
parameters.description: This is a body id e.g. '1' for 'Limousine' in Germany.

parameters.name: productGroups
parameters.description:
Specifies to which product groups the vehicles belong which should be returned. The product groups are separated from each other by a comma and are case sensitive. Allowed values are:
  * PKW
  * VAN
  * SMART

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

methods.description: Get the class for the given marketId and classId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: This is a class id e.g. '176' for 'A-Klasse' in Germany.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: The class of a Vehicle, e.g. 'A-Class'.

methods.description: Get all available models for the given marketId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: This is a class id e.g. '176' for 'A-Class' in Germany.

parameters.name: bodyId
parameters.description: This is a body id e.g. '1' for 'Limousine' in Germany.

parameters.name: baumuster4Prefix
parameters.description: The first four digits of a baumuster are called baumuster4prefix e.g. '1760' for 'Berline' in France.

parameters.name: baumuster
parameters.description: This is a baumuster e.g. '176042' for 'A 180 Limousine' in Germany.

parameters.name: nationalSalesType
parameters.description: This is the national sales type (NST) of a distinct baumuster. There is no predefined pattern for the NST, each market defines its NST. e.g. 'E07' in France, 0001 in Germany and ZA1 in South Africa Using the NST markets can define market specific conditions. e.g. different initial configuration, etc.

parameters.name: productGroups
parameters.description:
Specifies to which product groups the vehicles belong which should be returned. The product groups are separated from each other by a comma and are case sensitive. Allowed values are:
  * PKW
  * VAN
  * SMART

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

methods.description: Get the model for the given marketId and modelId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: The model of a Vehicle, e.g. '176042_002'.

methods.description: Get the initial configuration for the given marketId and modelId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: A vehicle configuration.

methods.description: Get the configuration for the given marketId, modelId and configurationId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a configuration e.g. 'E-D15-D18-D41-D46-D49-D52-D53-D54-D59-D60-D71-F32-F36-F88-F98-G03-G05-G36-G56-I61-J53-J67-L08-M23-M70-N18-N62-N92-O76-Q29-Q56-Q79-Q92-S01-S05-S08-S63-S92-T05-T07-T62-T84-T88_I-953_L-696_P-001_S-152-160-161-171-258-290-292-294-351-360-411-440-442-470-472-475-485-520-533-538-560-570-573-580-584-58U-591-620-70B-808-888-893-B03-B16-K11-L18-R43-U60'. A codeType is only once within the configurationId e.g 'S-152-160-161' stands for the components with the componentId 'S-152', 'S-160' and 'S-161'. A new codeType is divided from the codes with a underscore e.g 'S-152-160-161_I-953_L-696'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: A vehicle configuration.

methods.description: Get the alternatives for the given marketId, modelId, configurationId and componentList.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a configuration e.g. 'E-D15-D18-D41-D46-D49-D52-D53-D54-D59-D60-D71-F32-F36-F88-F98-G03-G05-G36-G56-I61-J53-J67-L08-M23-M70-N18-N62-N92-O76-Q29-Q56-Q79-Q92-S01-S05-S08-S63-S92-T05-T07-T62-T84-T88_I-953_L-696_P-001_S-152-160-161-171-258-290-292-294-351-360-411-440-442-470-472-475-485-520-533-538-560-570-573-580-584-58U-591-620-70B-808-888-893-B03-B16-K11-L18-R43-U60'. A codeType is only once within the configurationId e.g 'S-152-160-161' stands for the components with the componentId 'S-152', 'S-160' and 'S-161'. A new codeType is divided from the codes with a underscore e.g 'S-152-160-161_I-953_L-696'.

parameters.name: componentList
parameters.description: A string representing the changes, in other words a list of components that will be added and removed. The following syntax is used for the components to be added and the components to be removed. The added components e.g. '+I-950_L-890' and the removed components e.g. '-I-953_L-696' and the delimiter between the added and removed components is ','. In one components string '+I-950_L-890,-I-953_L-696'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

methods.description:
Returns URLs pointing to images in JPG format in the highest available resolution (depending on the component) of the vehicle's:
  * engine (1024x576 px),
  * rim (710x710 px),
  * trim (800x600 px),
  * paints (800x600 px),
  * upholstery (800x600 px) and
  * equipments (740x416 px).

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a configuration e.g. 'E-D15-D18-D41-D46-D49-D52-D53-D54-D59-D60-D71-F32-F36-F88-F98-G03-G05-G36-G56-I61-J53-J67-L08-M23-M70-N18-N62-N92-O76-Q29-Q56-Q79-Q92-S01-S05-S08-S63-S92-T05-T07-T62-T84-T88_I-953_L-696_P-001_S-152-160-161-171-258-290-292-294-351-360-411-440-442-470-472-475-485-520-533-538-560-570-573-580-584-58U-591-620-70B-808-888-893-B03-B16-K11-L18-R43-U60'. A codeType is only once within the configurationId e.g 'S-152-160-161' stands for the components with the componentId 'S-152', 'S-160' and 'S-161'. A new codeType is divided from the codes with a underscore e.g 'S-152-160-161_I-953_L-696'.

responses.description: Components images object
The error object containing detailed information about the error.
The error object containing detailed information about the error.

methods.description: Returns URLs pointing to images of this vehicle's equipments. The images are available in the highest possible resolution (usually 740x416 px).

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a configuration e.g. 'E-D15-D18-D41-D46-D49-D52-D53-D54-D59-D60-D71-F32-F36-F88-F98-G03-G05-G36-G56-I61-J53-J67-L08-M23-M70-N18-N62-N92-O76-Q29-Q56-Q79-Q92-S01-S05-S08-S63-S92-T05-T07-T62-T84-T88_I-953_L-696_P-001_S-152-160-161-171-258-290-292-294-351-360-411-440-442-470-472-475-485-520-533-538-560-570-573-580-584-58U-591-620-70B-808-888-893-B03-B16-K11-L18-R43-U60'. A codeType is only once within the configurationId e.g 'S-152-160-161' stands for the components with the componentId 'S-152', 'S-160' and 'S-161'. A new codeType is divided from the codes with a underscore e.g 'S-152-160-161_I-953_L-696'.

responses.description: The response object holds either an error object, in case that the request was malformed, or an equipments object containing a map with all equipment urls for the requested vehicle with the equipment codes as map keys.
The error object containing detailed information about the error.

methods.description: Returns URLs pointing to PNG images of a vehicle with a white background.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a configuration e.g. 'E-D15-D18-D41-D46-D49-D52-D53-D54-D59-D60-D71-F32-F36-F88-F98-G03-G05-G36-G56-I61-J53-J67-L08-M23-M70-N18-N62-N92-O76-Q29-Q56-Q79-Q92-S01-S05-S08-S63-S92-T05-T07-T62-T84-T88_I-953_L-696_P-001_S-152-160-161-171-258-290-292-294-351-360-411-440-442-470-472-475-485-520-533-538-560-570-573-580-584-58U-591-620-70B-808-888-893-B03-B16-K11-L18-R43-U60'. A codeType is only once within the configurationId e.g 'S-152-160-161' stands for the components with the componentId 'S-152', 'S-160' and 'S-161'. A new codeType is divided from the codes with a underscore e.g 'S-152-160-161_I-953_L-696'.

parameters.name: perspectives
parameters.description:
One or more perspectives as a comma separated String list e.g. 'EXT000,EXT010,INT1'.  The following perspectives are available:
  * EXT000-EXT350: EXT000 defines the front view, EXT010 defines a rotation of 10 degress and so forth.
  * INT1-INT4: These are the 4 available interior perspectives.

The default value is EXT020,INT1 if no value is provided.

parameters.name: roofOpen
parameters.description: Set 'true', if you are looking for images with the roof open. This option is only valid for cabrios. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: night
parameters.description: Set 'true', if you are looking for images with a darker background and the vehicle's headlights turned on. Default is 'false'.

responses.description: The response object holds either an error object, in case that the request was malformed, or a vehicle object containing all urls for the requested perspectives.
The error object containing detailed information about the error.
The error object containing detailed information about the error.
The error object containing detailed information about the error.

parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a model e.g. '176042_002'. If no nationalSalesType is available, the modelId only consists of the baumuster e.g. '176042'.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Minimal string that identifies a configuration e.g. 'E-D15-D18-D41-D46-D49-D52-D53-D54-D59-D60-D71-F32-F36-F88-F98-G03-G05-G36-G56-I61-J53-J67-L08-M23-M70-N18-N62-N92-O76-Q29-Q56-Q79-Q92-S01-S05-S08-S63-S92-T05-T07-T62-T84-T88_I-953_L-696_P-001_S-152-160-161-171-258-290-292-294-351-360-411-440-442-470-472-475-485-520-533-538-560-570-573-580-584-58U-591-620-70B-808-888-893-B03-B16-K11-L18-R43-U60'. A codeType is only once within the configurationId e.g 'S-152-160-161' stands for the components with the componentId 'S-152', 'S-160' and 'S-161'. A new codeType is divided from the codes with a underscore e.g 'S-152-160-161_I-953_L-696'.

parameters.name: componentTypes
parameters.description:
A list of component types separated by a comma case insensitive. If nothing is defined all component types are returned. Allowed values are:
  - WHEELS
  - PAINTS
  - UPHOLSTERIES
  - TRIMS
  - PACKAGES
  - LINES
  - SPECIAL_EDITION
  - SPECIAL_EQUIPMENT

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: Contains the vehicle components and the structure with component categories.

methods.description: Stores the configuration of the given configurationId and modelId

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

responses.description: The onlinecode is a unique identifier for a stored vehicle configuration.

methods.description: Get the configuration of the given onlineCode and marketId.

parameters.name: onlineCode
parameters.description: OnlineCode string that identifies a vehicle configuration e.g. 'M6882554'.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: A vehicle configuration.

methods.description: Get all configured active product groups for the given marketId.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: This is a ISO 3166 language country string e.g. 'de_DE' or 'en_GB'.

parameters.name: fieldsFilter
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned.

responses.description: Represent the active product groups for a market.

apiDescription: The Car Configurator API offers access to the Mercedes-Benz car configuration functions. It provides required reference data such as the masterdata of all Mercedes-Benz vehicles as well as functions to retrieve initial and changed configurations. In addition to that is is possible to save a newly created configuration so that it can be easily restored or shared with others.
